name: CreateWebhookForNotifications
description:
Create webhooks to receive event notifications.

This tool allows you to set up webhooks for receiving notifications about specific events in your Websets. Upon creation, you'll specify the events to monitor and the destination URL for the notifications. The webhook activates immediately, and you'll receive a secret key for signature verification, visible only once at this point.

parameters.name: webhook_configuration
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing the events to monitor and the destination URL for notifications.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa API.
